title: The Quiet land
creator_credit: Joe Mendoza and Ronald H Riley and Associates
brief_description: Northern Ireland’s scenery, some of its wildlife, its cottage industry, including weaving, blacksmithing, pottery and printing, its ruins, including ancient monoliths ad some entertainments are also shows. The images are accompanied, now and then, by Irish music and comments in the form of subtitles.
